citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Excessive amounts of flying insects remain throughout the facility. The insects were found on the inside of the facility and
also on the outside runs. Four fly strips were placed inside and are completely filled with insects. The inspection report
dated 6-JULY-2023 had a correction date of 13-JULY-2023 for the insects but the licensee states they just started placing
insect bait a few days ago. Insects can spread disease, contaminate food and water, and cause discomfort and distress to
the animals. An effective program for the control of insects and external parasites affecting dogs must be established and
maintained so as to promote the health and well-being of the animals and reduce contamination by pests in animal areas.
The licensee must establish an effective plan for the control of the insects.
The Direct Non-Compliant Item on the inspection report dated 06-JULY-2023 has been corrected.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(d)  Repeat
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Excessive amounts of flying insects remain throughout the facility. The insects were found on the inside of the facility and 
also on the outside runs. Four fly strips were placed inside and are completely filled with insects. The inspection report 
dated 6-JULY-2023 had a correction date of 13-JULY-2023 for the insects but the licensee states they just started placing 
insect bait a few days ago. Insects can spread disease, contaminate food and water, and cause discomfort and distress to 
the animals. An effective program for the control of insects and external parasites affecting dogs must be established and 
maintained so as to promote the health and well-being of the animals and reduce contamination by pests in animal areas. 
The licensee must establish an effective plan for the control of the insects. 
 
The Direct Non-Compliant Item on the inspection report dated 06-JULY-2023 has been corrected. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
